name: MushRush (Yurdin, DeKrullevaar)
description:
Mush Rush is a quick weekend developed game where you will find your way to the enemies base and destroy it!

To attack, aim (by holding right mouse) then press 'e' to punch, or left mouse to spawn a clone!

Assets used:

Beyond Wonderland font from https://fonts.webtoolhub.com/

Unity Standard Asset Pack

URP Stylized Water Shader from BITGEM
